imdb.query:
SELECT title, analogy_3cosadd_ivfadc('Godfather', 'Francis_Ford_Coppola', title) AS director FROM imdb.title
WHERE analogy_3cosadd_ivfadc('Godfather', 'Francis_Ford_Coppola', title) != '' LIMIT 100

SELECT token, grouptoken
FROM grouping_func(ARRAY(SELECT regexp_replace(title, ' ', '_', 'g') FROM imdb.title
WHERE title NOT LIKE '%''%' LIMIT 1000), '{Europe,America}')

SELECT keyword, cosine_similarity(keyword, 'comedy') FROM imdb.keyword AS k
INNER JOIN google_vecs ON google_vecs.word = k.keyword
ORDER BY cosine_similarity(keyword, 'comedy') DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, ANN.word FROM imdb.title, knn(title.title, 5) AS ANN LIMIT 100
SELECT ANN.word FROM knn_in('Godfather', 5, ARRAY(SELECT title::varchar(80) FROM imdb.title)) AS ANN
